SELECT DISTINCT we.id ,d.code eventType ,d.icon img ,d.name disasterName ,d.disaster_color disasterColor ,d.disaster_level disasterLevel ,o.organization_name organizationName ,we.msg_type msgType ,DATE_FORMAT(we.send_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') effective ,wec.content description ,we.instruction FROM warn_edit we LEFT JOIN disaster d ON d.id = we.disaster_id LEFT JOIN organization o ON o.id = we.organization_id LEFT JOIN warn_edit_content wec ON wec.warn_edit_id = we.id
WHERE DATE_FORMAT(we.send_time,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d') AND status > 0

SELECT 1 flow,count(*) count FROM( SELECT wef.flow FROM warn_edit we LEFT JOIN warn_edit_flow wef on we.id = wef.warn_edit_id WHERE we.status = 0 and wef.is_option = 0 AND wef.flow = 1 AND we.area_id = #{areaId} GROUP BY wef.warn_edit_id ) tab union all (SELECT 2 flow,count(*) count FROM( SELECT wef.flow FROM warn_edit we LEFT JOIN warn_edit_flow wef on we.id = wef.warn_edit_id WHERE we.status = 0 and wef.is_option = 0 AND wef.flow = 2 AND we.area_id = #{areaId} GROUP BY wef.warn_edit_id ) tab) union all (SELECT 3 flow,count(*) count FROM( SELECT wef.flow FROM warn_edit we LEFT JOIN warn_edit_flow wef on we.id = wef.warn_edit_id WHERE we.status = 0 and wef.is_option = 0 AND wef.flow = 3 AND we.area_id = #{areaId} GROUP BY wef.warn_edit_id ) tab) union all (SELECT 4 flow,count(*) count FROM( SELECT wef.flow FROM warn_edit we LEFT JOIN warn_edit_flow wef on we.id = wef.warn_edit_id WHERE we.status = 0 and wef.is_option = 0 AND wef.flow = 4 AND we.area_id = #{areaId} GROUP BY wef.warn_edit_id ) tab) union all (SELECT 6 flow,count(*) count FROM( SELECT wef.flow FROM warn_edit we LEFT JOIN warn_edit_flow wef on we.id = wef.warn_edit_id WHERE we.status = 0 and wef.is_option = 0 AND wef.flow = 6 AND we.area_id = #{areaId} GROUP BY wef.warn_edit_id ) tab)
